name: nyks
keywords: Let's have a beer and talk in Paris

scripts.todo: color crypto date fs function generator http lang math node_modules object path process promise require src stream string
scripts.checkall: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
scripts.cover: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --report text-summary --report html --report lcov  node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --recursive
scripts.test: npm run cover  test test/async && npm run checkall

readme:
# nyks toolkit

Extend nodejs & javascript native API of missing functions.
